b. b. king.gloss: United States guitar player and singer of the blues (born in 1925)

bb.gloss: a small pellet fired from an air rifle or BB gun

bb shot.gloss: a small pellet fired from an air rifle or BB gun

bbl.gloss: any of various units of capacity

bbs.gloss: a computer that is running software that allows users to leave messages and access information of general interest
